summary: This is an email from an Assistant U.S. Attorney in the Southern District of New York to Mr. Skinner, transmitting a grand jury subpoena directed to the law firm Boies Schiller Flexner LLP in connection with the civil case Jane Doe 43 v. Epstein, et al. It demonstrates ongoing federal grand jury investigation activity related to the Epstein case in early 2019.

persons.name: Mr. Skinner
persons.role: Authorized agent for service of process
persons.context: Addressee of the email, identified as authorized to accept service on behalf of the law firm Boies Schiller Flexner LLP for a grand jury subpoena.

persons.name: Jane Doe 43
persons.context: The pseudonymous plaintiff in the referenced civil lawsuit (17 Civ. 0616) against Jeffrey Epstein and others.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Named defendant in the civil case Jane Doe 43 v. Epstein, et al., which is the subject of the grand jury subpoena.

connections.description: Implied legal adversarial relationship as plaintiff and defendant in civil lawsuit 17 Civ. 0616.
Mr. Skinner is authorized to accept legal service on behalf of the law firm Boies Schiller Flexner LLP.

events.title: Grand Jury Subpoena Issued to Boies Schiller Flexner LLP
events.description: An Assistant U.S. Attorney serves a grand jury subpoena on the law firm Boies Schiller Flexner LLP in connection with the civil case Jane Doe 43 v. Epstein, et al.

keyFacts: A federal grand jury subpoena was issued to the law firm Boies Schiller Flexner LLP on February 5, 2019.
The subpoena is related to the civil case 'Jane Doe 43 v. Epstein, et al., 17 Civ. 0616 (JGK)(SN)'.
This indicates an active federal criminal investigation (via grand jury) into matters related to Jeffrey Epstein was ongoing in early 2019, parallel to civil litigation.
The communication is from an Assistant U.S. Attorney in the Southern District of New York, showing federal prosecutor involvement.
The law firm Boies Schiller Flexner LLP was in possession of information relevant to the grand jury's investigation.
